product_context.title: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: Quality switch, easy to add to HomeKit, I wish they dimmed further. The 2-way switches dim the lights significantly more, at the lowest setting it's too bright for me.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2025
reviews.title: Doesn't dim far enough

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: First one I installed has now locked in the on position. Unresponsive to WiFi AND the physical switch. Completely defective. Out of return window for Amazon.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2025
reviews.title: Dead. Lights can’t be turned off!!!

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: Connected well to the phone and Siri but it flickers all the time. I installed it at 4 different locations and the flickering is so annoying. I like their other products tbh but this light switch was a disappointment. The problem could be something else but we have other dimmable light switches in the house and those are always fine. This was a waste of money.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2025
reviews.title: Started great but failed after a couple of months

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: They are great if they work. When (and not if) they crash - a weird concept for a light switch, but essentially disconnect from the WiFi - the physical switch buttons will stop working as well! One has to switch the circuit breaker from the panel off and on to “restart” the switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
reviews.title: Flawed design

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these switches (like 30) a little over a month ago. I recognize that’s a while, but I bought them for a new house and am just getting moved in. While I’ve installed about 20 and they’ve gone well so far, when I opened my last “4 pack” I was surprised to find that the switches were used! Granted, the box was completely sealed. 2 of the switches were some old style switch and all had seemingly been installed previously (look at the photos of the wire ends). Also, one of the old style had a yellow post-it note that says “bad” on it! How does this happen?!?! Amazon is refunding, but it still screws up my install process (and they couldn’t care less), plus I have to go through a reorder process to re-buy them at a now increased price! They say they’ll adjust the price for me if I contract them again after I receive the new product. What a pain… the process just seems to get worse and worse with Amazon. On the switches, I’d say they’re easy to install and setup and they integrate seamlessly with HomeKit. I have no complaints at all about the new/working products and would recommend them, but I might not recommend buying the 4 packs and possibly buy them from someone other than Amazon (maybe Meross directly). My rating: 5 stars for the working products, -5 stars for the 4 pack and 2 stars for Amazon support.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2024
reviews.title: Used Switches in a Sealed Box!

reviews.productTitle: meross 4 Pack Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole Supports Apple HomeKit, Alexa Google Assistant & SmartThings, 2.4Ghz WiFi Light Switch for Dimmable LED, Neutral Wire Required, Remote Control Schedule
reviews.text: Easy install. Connects easily to Apple HomeKit. So much better than my old smart switches.
